alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Madison; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, EASTERN FAYETTE, PICKAWAY, SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND NORTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Greenfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, Washington Court House, Circleville, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Kingston, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Logan Elm Village, Obetz, Commercial Point, Good Hope, Frankfort, Fox and Clarksburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
